attributes.title: SURGICAL LOVE - #81
attributes.caption: A lot of fertility experts get it all wrong nowadays. What you wanna do, for the best chance at conceiving, is really stick your hand as far up your husbands anus as you can.
attributes.description: A lot of fertility experts get it all wrong nowadays. What you wanna do, for the best chance at conceiving, is really stick your hand as far up your husbands anus as you can. The deeper you're in there, the better chance of finding the baby making stuff he's hiding in there.Sponsored by MVMT

attributes.title: MUPPET HEAD - #82
attributes.caption: It's never been Jon's intention as a host to kill his contestants but in the event it organically occurs on the show you can be rest assured that we will be sure to keep the cameras rolling.
attributes.description: It's never been Jon's intention as a host to kill his contestants but in the event it organically occurs on the show you can be rest assured that we will be sure to keep the cameras rolling. This episode originally aired January 27, 2017 and is sponsored by Audible and Blue Apron

attributes.title: GUNS & NIPS -  #83
attributes.caption: Make jokes. Get jacked. Profit.

attributes.title: PATRICK SWAYZE FLAVOR -  #84
attributes.caption: In all seriousness, if ghosts actually existed wouldn't you want to know what they taste like? And to be clear, all of you saying no right now are lying to yourself.
attributes.description: In all seriousness, if ghosts actually existed wouldn't you want to know what they taste like? And to be clear, all of you saying no right now are lying to yourself.1-800-FlowersJackThreads

attributes.title: NO SWEAR WORDS - #85
attributes.caption: ​You don't have to use naughty no-no words to be funny.
attributes.description: You don't have to use naughty no-no words to be funny. Not everything has to be toilet humor and sex jokes all the time, you know? On The Spot is your one stop for clean humor and guilt-free fun. Join us, won't you?

attributes.title: THE DUNKELMANS -  #86
attributes.caption: Barbara's dad joins On The Spot this week to help his little maple syrup angel make some jokes about unprotected sleep, talk about Keanu's next movie and watch her slap Tyler's firm ass.
attributes.description: Barbara's dad joins On The Spot this week to help his little maple syrup angel make some jokes about unprotected sleep, talk about Keanu's next movie and watch her slap Tyler's firm ass.

attributes.description: What does United Airlines, an anime body pillow, bath salts, blue waffle and the end of times have in common? Why, this episode of course. Buckle up. This ones got some kick to it.

attributes.title: SMASHMOUTH ALLSTARS - #94
attributes.caption: Is Smashmouth looking for a new lead singer for the band because we know a certain drunk New Englander named Jeremy Dooley who is ready for the audition of his life.

attributes.title: NEW HOST AUDITIONS - #95
attributes.caption: Turns out just giving in and letting other people take a shot at hosting the show is a lot easier for Jon than trying to get them to do what he wants the usual way.
attributes.description: Turns out just giving in and letting other people take a shot at hosting the show is a lot easier for Jon than trying to get them to do what he wants the usual way.

attributes.title: MOTHER'S DAY BEER CAM - #96

attributes.description: In honor of the upcoming Mother's Day holiday we give each other flowers, drink beer and talk about SIDS. As usual.
